name: Cat Berry Tales
description:
A contemporary abridged version of the famous Canterbury Tales! Experienced thru RPG Maker and with multiple paths to take, this game gives you essentially the same experience as reading the original (sorta, like if it were written by a middle school girl today). 

Game contains:

  • 5 Stories
  • Multiple paths in 4 of the 5 stories
  • A HUGE cast of characters
  • Tons of stolen assets!
  • SHORT game, like probs an hour at most but typically like 30 minutes
